thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 39 of 227
thread.title: Michele S
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Michele S

author: Michele S
title: Michele S
text: We went in just looking for at living room furniture. The sales person TJ asked us what we were looking at, we told him we were just browsing. He never once hassaled us while we were looking around. He would check on us and give us information on a piece that we were sitting on and walk away. Once we decided on a set he was great and went the extra mile. We will be going back for a mattress in the near future. We love our new living room furniture.
